column9:
Lunch at a good price, 10 pcs for 80 sek. 
Tiny place (two tables for 4p each) and a little waiting should be expected. 
Staff is friendly and accomodating.
Fresh, tasty and beautiful sushi.

After trying at least 5 different sushi places to take away in Lund, this is my favourite place. I have always ordered the platter for two people. It has always been beautifully arranged, with varied and good sushi. I love that there are many types...More

Very friendly, if tiny restaurant. We have had sushi from here several times. When it first opened it was better value than some others in Lund, but thats no longer the case. The sushi itself is ok - some interesting dressing with sauces and cream...More

column7: One of the best sushi in Lund
column9: This is one of the best sushi in Lund. The price is not so expensive. The sushi is fresh and the sauce is very creative. The owner of the restaurant is very kind and helpful. I was still pregnant when first visited the restaurant, and...More
totally ok, nothing more nothing less. There are better places in Lund (and worse too!) Really only take away as it is rather small

column7: really a hole in the wall
column9: sushi was ok, but there was only two tables. the pieces had some cream on the top ok for me but maybe not for purists

We went to Bonsai with a friend to give it a try. I have enough experience with sushi. What you get here is the following: 
1) Nice guys. Really kind and warm people. 
2) Warm ambience. 
3) Reasonable prices. 
4) Sushi overwhelmed by spices, sauces...More

I'm a sushi lover and have had sushi at several different sushi bars in Lund, not to mention around the world. When this little place opened up I was probably one of their first guests. Since my first visit, I haven't even considered going back...More

I have been to Bonsai Sushi Bar about four or five times the last six months and I have been very pleased every time. The fish is fresh, seasonal and perfectly cut. I do like sushi, but don't eat it very often – perhaps once...More
